RelatedSentence: KABUL - Lawmakers in the Senate , upper house of the Afghan parliament ordered investigation into the alleged recruitment of Afghan refugees by the Iranian security forces to fight in Syria , an Afghan news service reported on Monday .
Senate Chairman Fazal Hadi Muslimyar asked the Afghan government to seek clarification from Iran in this regard .
